text.body:
The following congratulatory message has today been sent to Mr Bill Clinton via the South African Embassy in Washington, DC:
Mr President
The Government and the people of South Africa join me in extending to you warm congratulations and good wishes on the occasion of you re-election as President of the United States of America.
I am confident that the good relationship which already exists between our two countries, can be expanded upon under your continued leadership.
With highest consideration
Signed by: Nelson R Mandela
